alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 4:42PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rich... northwestern Summit and southwestern Uinta Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 441 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Coalville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Evanston, Wahsatch and Castle Rock. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 1 and 5. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 170 and 196. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Western Uinta Mountains
